bug.author: ValcoEskex
bug.description: I migrated to 0.6v but i get a lot of errors (1245) in VisualStudio. I tried to run all the trubleshooting that i did with the 0.5v but it doesnt help at all. The most frequent error is the CS0229.

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ValcoEskex>@ValcoEskex</denchmark-link>
Can you please provide a few more details about the specific errors you are encountering?

Of course. There are 9 errors that appear several times. Those errors are: CS0115 no suitable method found to override CS0756 A partial method may not have multiple defining aclarations CS0229 Ambiguity between two variables (mainly) CS0579 Duplicated attributes CS0263 Partial declarations of 'brain' must not specify different base classes CS0121 The vall is ambiguius between two methods or properties CS0101 The namespace '----' akready contains a Assembly.CSharp definition for'----' CS0102 The type '----' already contains a Assembly CSharp definition for '----' CS0111 Type '----' already defines a member called '----' with the same parameter types

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ValcoEskex>@ValcoEskex</denchmark-link>
Thanks for providing additional information. We will look into this. Just as a question, do you think this issue is related to the issue here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/issues/1511>#1511</denchmark-link>

I haven't reported this issue but I reported <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/issues/1511>#1511</denchmark-link> and I don't think they are related. Errors look differently. But I'm not an expert :)
Due to inactivity, I am closing this issue for now. Please feel free to re-open if you are still having this issue with ML-Agents v0.7.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
